'''Linda Proudfoot, n√©e Baggins''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Linda was the fourth child of [[Mungo Baggins]] and [[Laura Grubb]]. She married [[Bodo Proudfoot]] and was the mother of [[Odo Proudfoot|Odo]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2003: [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (2003 video game)]]:'''
:Five portraits are clustered on a wall in [[Bag End]]. One of them is Linda, and one of Bilbo's lines when looking at the portraits is "That's my aunt Linda when she was a child".
